title: How many albums can an artist produce and release in a year? Who has produced and released the most albums in a year? - Quora

response.answer_text: In terms of actually recording an album, it really depends on the artist, their process, and their experience (or lack thereof). Groundbreaking Since 2015’s We Are Monsters, Groundbreaking has released five albums, at a pace of about one every six months, with the quality ranging from “pretty good” to “Jesus Christ please stop and take your time”. This has mixed results; it’s cool to get new music so fast, but more often than not it’s not anything great, and he hasn’t released anything even close to the quality of We Are Monsters since.

If it’s not King Gizzard & the Lizard Wizard, they’re certainly contenders. Flying Microtonal Banana (2017)Murder of the Universe (2017)Sketches of Brunswick East (2017; with Mild High Club)Polygondwanaland (2017)Gumboot Soup (2017)
